mapper.select: SELECT a.REQUST_ID , a.INQIRE_DT , a.SRVC_NM , a.INQIRE_INFO , a.RQESTER_IP , a.RQESTER_ID , b.USER_NM AS RQESTER_NM FROM COMTNPRIVACYLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.RQESTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.REQUST_ID = #{requestId}

SELECT a.REQUST_ID , a.INQIRE_DT , a.SRVC_NM , a.INQIRE_INFO , a.RQESTER_IP , a.RQESTER_ID , b.USER_NM AS RQESTER_NM FROM COMTNPRIVACYLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.RQESTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.INQIRE_INFO LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWord},'%')
AND a.INQIRE_DT BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{searchBeginDate},' 00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{searchEndDate},' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
ORDER BY a.INQIRE_DT DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(a.REQUST_ID) as cnt FROM COMTNPRIVACYLOG a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.RQESTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.INQIRE_INFO LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWord},'%')
AND a.INQIRE_DT BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{searchBeginDate},' 00:00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{searchEndDate},' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
